div.p: END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT FOR MORPHILO TOOLSET IMPORTANT PLEASE READ THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS LICENSE AGREEMENT CAREFULLY BEFORE CONTINUING WITH THIS PROGRAM INSTALL: Morphilo's End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you (either an individual or a single entity) and Morphilo. for the Morphilo software product(s) identified above which may include associated software components, media, printed materials, and "online" or electronic documentation ("Morphilizer", "MorExtractor", "MorQuery"). By installing, copying, or otherwise using the Morphilo-Toolset, you agree to be bound by the terms of this EULA. This license agreement represents the entire agreement concerning the program between you and Morphilo, (referred to as "licenser"), and it supersedes any prior proposal, representation, or understanding between the parties. If you do not agree to the terms of this EULA, do not install or use the MORPHILO Toolset.
The MORPHILO Toolset is protected by copyright laws and international copyright treaties, as well as other intellectual property laws and treaties. The MORPHILO Toolset is licensed, not sold.

1. GRANT OF LICENSE.
The MORPHILO Toolset is licensed as follows:
(a) Installation and Use.
MORPHILO grants you the right to install and use copies of the MORPHILO Toolset on your computer running a validly licensed copy of the operating system for which the MORPHILO Toolset was designed [e.g., Windows 95, Windows NT, Windows 98, Windows 2000, Windows 2003, Windows XP, Windows ME, Windows Vista].
(b) Backup Copies.
You may also make copies of the MORPHILO Toolset as may be necessary for backup and archival purposes.

2. DESCRIPTION OF OTHER RIGHTS AND LIMITATIONS.
(a) Maintenance of Copyright Notices.
You must not remove or alter any copyright notices on any and all copies of the MORPHILO Toolset.
(b) Distribution.
You may not distribute registered copies of the MORPHILO Toolset to third parties. Evaluation versions available for download from MORPHILO's websites may be freely distributed.
(c) Prohibition on Reverse Engineering, Decompilation, and Disassembly.
You may not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the MORPHILO Toolset, except and only to the extent that such activity is expressly permitted by applicable law notwithstanding this limitation.
(d) Rental.
You may not rent, lease, or lend the SOFTWARE PRODUCT.
(e) Support Services.
MORPHILO may provide you with support services related to the MORPHILO Toolset ("Support Services"). Any supplemental software code provided to you as part of the Support Services shall be considered part of the MORPHILO Toolset and subject to the terms and conditions of this EULA.
(f) Compliance with Applicable Laws.
You must comply with all applicable laws regarding use of the MORPHILO Toolset.

3. TERMINATION
Without prejudice to any other rights, MORPHILO may terminate this EULA if you fail to comply with the terms and conditions of this EULA. In such event, you must destroy all copies of the MORPHILO Toolset in your possession.

4. COPYRIGHT
All title, including but not limited to copyrights, in and to the MORPHILO Toolset and any copies thereof are owned by MORPHILO or its suppliers. All title and intellectual property rights in and to the content which may be accessed through use of the MORPHILO Toolset is the property of the respective content owner and may be protected by applicable copyright or other intellectual property laws and treaties. This EULA grants you no rights to use such content. All rights not expressly granted are reserved by MORPHILO.

5. NO WARRANTIES
MORPHILO expressly disclaims any warranty for the MORPHILO Toolset. The MORPHILO Toolset is provided 'As Is' without any express or implied warranty of any kind, including but not limited to any warranties of merchantability, noninfringement, or fitness of a particular purpose. MORPHILO does not warrant or assume responsibility for the accuracy or completeness of any information, text, graphics, links or other items contained within the MORPHILO Toolset. MORPHILO makes no warranties respecting any harm that may be caused by the transmission of a computer virus, worm, time bomb, logic bomb, or other such computer program. MORPHILO further expressly disclaims any warranty or representation to Authorized Users or to any third party.

6. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
In no event shall MORPHILO be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, lost profits, business interruption, or lost information) rising out of 'Authorized Users' use of or inability to use the MORPHILO Toolset, even if MORPHILO has been advised of the possibility of such damages. In no event will MORPHILO be liable for loss of data or for indirect, special, incidental, consequential (including lost profit), or other damages based in contract, tort or otherwise. MORPHILO shall have no liability with respect to the content of the MORPHILO Toolset or any part thereof, including but not limited to errors or omissions contained therein, libel, infringements of rights of publicity, privacy, trademark rights, business interruption, personal injury, loss of privacy, moral rights or the disclosure of confidential information.
